# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that handles the double-tap or squeeze interactions a person makes on Apple Pencil.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIPencilInteractionDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Handling interactions

- **UIPencilInteractionDelegate**: The interface an object implements to handle double taps or squeezes a person makes on Apple Pencil.
